bibl.seg: STÖKL BEN EZRA Daniel, Weighing the Parts. A Papyrological Perspective on the Parting of the Ways. Avec résumé en anglais.

A comparison of the ideological composition of the Qumran library and Christian libraries from ancient Egypt. The central thesis of the author is that second and third century Egyptian Christianity developed largely without connection to Jewish communities (in part. outside of Alexandria).
